tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE adverse_events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  event_date TIMESTAMP,
  event_description VARCHAR(255),
  drug_id INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_drug FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES drugs(drug_id)
);

CREATE TABLE adverse_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_date DATE,
    event_description TEXT,
    patient_id INT,
    drug_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE drug_safety_info (
    drug_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_name VARCHAR(255),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    approval_date DATE,
    adverse_reactions TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE AdverseEvents (
    event_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    event_date DATE,
    event_description TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DrugSafetyInformation (
    drug_id INT,
    drug_name VARCHAR(255),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    approval_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY(drug_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RegulatoryCompliance (
    regulation_id INT,
    regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
    regulatory_body VARCHAR(255),
    compliance_status BOOLEAN,
    PRIMARY KEY(regulation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AdverseEvents (
  event_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  event_date DATE,
  patient_id INT,
  adverse_reaction TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE DrugSafetyInformation (
  drug_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_name TEXT,
  manufacturer TEXT,
  safety_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE RegulatoryCompliance (
  compliance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation TEXT,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE PatientSafety (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name TEXT,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  contact_number VARCHAR(15)
)
